cta.title: AN APP THAT SAVES LIVES
cta.description: Our app connects you with emergency medical services in real time and provides personalized health tracking.

about.title: ABOUT OUR APP
about.description: Our app is designed to provide quick and accessible medical assistance, improving the quality of life for our users.

cards.title: ACCESSIBLE DESIGN
cards.message: We’ve created an intuitive interface so that anyone can use the app without difficulties.

cards.title: EASY TO USE
cards.message: Our app is simple and straightforward, allowing you to access medical services with just a few taps.

cards.title: THE BEST EXPERIENCE
cards.message: We guarantee an excellent user experience, focused on your needs and well-being.

functions.title: APP FEATURES
functions.description: Discover the key features that make our app an indispensable tool for your health care.

cards.title: PERSONALIZED CARE
cards.message: Access personalized medical consultations with certified professionals.

cards.title: DAILY REMINDERS
cards.message: Receive daily notifications to take your medications and attend your medical appointments.

cards.title: ONLINE MEDICAL RECORD
cards.message: Keep an updated record of your medical history and share it with your doctor easily.

cards.title: IOS & ANDROID VERSION
cards.message: Available on major mobile platforms for your convenience.

cards.title: 24/7 SUPPORT BY REAL MEDICAL STAFF
cards.message: Get medical support anytime from qualified personnel.

howItWorks.title: HOW OUR APP WORKS
howItWorks.description: Our app uses advanced technology to connect users with medical services efficiently and securely.

whoWeAre.title: WHO WE ARE
whoWeAre.description: We are a dedicated team of health and technology professionals committed to your well-being.

cards.bio: Founder and CEO. With over 15 years of experience in the health industry, Ezequiel leads our team with passion and dedication.
Surgeon with over 20 years of experience. Carlos ensures that our app meets the highest medical standards.
Medical specialist in digital health. María works to effectively integrate technology into our app.

items.title: Justina's Law
items.subtitle: How the law was promoted
items.description: Justina's Law establishes that every citizen is an organ donor by default, increasing the chances of saving lives through solidarity.

items.title: MultiplyX7
items.subtitle: An act of love can save many lives
items.description: A campaign inspired by Justina that aims to raise awareness about the importance of organ donation, highlighting how one decision can impact seven people waiting for a transplant.

testimonials.title: TESTIMONIALS
testimonials.description: Our users share their experiences and how our app has improved their health and well-being.

cards.name: ANA GARCIA
cards.comment: The app was essential for receiving a kidney transplant. The speed in finding a donor was incredible.

cards.name: JUAN PÉREZ
cards.comment: Thanks to the app, I found the support I needed to manage my diabetes and improve my quality of life.

cards.name: MARÍA LOPEZ
cards.comment: The app helped me get the right treatment for my hypertension and maintain constant monitoring.

cards.name: LUIS MARTÍNEZ
cards.comment: The app was key to my recovery. I easily found the resources I needed for my rehabilitation.

cards.name: CARLA GONZÁLEZ
cards.comment: The app has allowed me to manage my asthma more effectively and prevent attacks thanks to its reminders and tips.

cards.name: ROBERTO SÁNCHEZ
cards.comment: Thanks to the app, I received the right treatment in time and avoided serious complications in my condition.

cards.name: LAURA FERNÁNDEZ
cards.comment: The app was a great help in coordinating my appointments and keeping me informed during my cancer treatment.

cards.name: MIGUEL ÁLVAREZ
cards.comment: The app helped me find the right treatment for my arthritis and improve my mobility.

cards.name: VERÓNICA MORALES
cards.comment: The app connected me with a therapist who has greatly helped me manage my depression. I am very grateful.

cards.name: ALBERTO GÓMEZ
cards.comment: The app gave me access to resources that improved my quality of life and helped me manage my condition.

footer.slogan: We join forces to build a bright future, full of hope and opportunities.

updatePassword.title: Update Password
updatePassword.minLength: The password must be at least {minLength} characters long.
updatePassword.hasUpperCase: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
updatePassword.hasLowerCase: The password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
updatePassword.hasNumber: The password must contain at least one digit.
updatePassword.hasSpecialChar: The password must contain at least one special character.

PopupMessage.title: Attention!
PopupMessage.content: Please select a doctor to continue with your appointment.

NotFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
NotFound.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.

warning.message: You have no pending appointments for this date

register.title: Register
register.patientRole: Patient: To manage your appointments and medical consultations.
register.doctorRole: Doctor: To manage your consultations and patients.
register.registrationSuccessMessage: An email with the access password to the application has been sent.

doctorList.placeholder: Search by doctor's name or specialty
